Expert Opinion Reports

Since 2010, we've provided authoritative expert opinion reports on wheelchair accessible housing to both plaintiff and defense counsel with unwavering objectivity.

Our recommendations are grounded in verifiable data rather than subjective interpretations, ensuring credible and defensible findings focused on reasonable accommodations.

Design Studio

Accessible remodeling is personal—there's no one-size-fits-all approach. Using LiDAR scanning, we create a precise digital model of your home and collaborate with you to develop layouts that prioritize safety, independence, and dignity.

90% of our design clients are served completely remotely!

About Us

Accessibility Experts: Where Experience Meets Empathy

Since 1998, we've been navigating the complex landscape of residential accessibility solutions, formalizing our expertise under Accessible Housing Services in 2007. Our portfolio includes high-profile cases involving catastrophically injured individuals, where our unique strength lies in harmonizing competing interests — balancing homeowners' desires for quality upgrades against budgetary constraints.

Our multidisciplinary team of healthcare professionals, construction specialists, and real estate experts brings a holistic approach to every project. We serve clients nationwide through our innovative remote assessment process, with over 90% of our clients served completely virtually.

We Work Remotely Across All 50 States

90% of our clients are served completely remotely. No matter where you are located in the United States, we can help with your accessible housing needs.
